recommendations.summary: Complete 5-session arc reframing quantum computing through coherence dynamics. Proposes qubits as temporal patterns, entanglement as phase locking, and two novel hardware architectures (Temporal Resonator, Phase-Locked Array). Includes 20 testable predictions and 9 proposed experiments.
strengths: 20 testable predictions with clear falsification criteria
Complete paradigm shift framing (temporal vs spatial)
Clear 'so what' - fundamentally changes QC design philosophy
weaknesses: Requires physics community buy-in on temporal interpretation
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'interpretive framework for quantum computing' rather than 'new physics'. Emphasize testable predictions and practical implications. Lead with paradigm comparison table.

recommendations.summary: Complete 5-session arc developing coherence theory of consciousness. Addresses observer problem, free will, qualia, collective consciousness, and consciousness-information relationship. Proposes C_conscious = C x S x Phi x R equation and agency levels scaling with coherence.
strengths: Complete philosophical arc with unified theory
weaknesses: May face resistance from both physicalists and dualists
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'theoretical framework' connecting coherence physics to consciousness studies. Emphasize testable predictions and connection to IIT. Acknowledge speculative nature while highlighting mathematical rigor.

recommendations.summary: Complete 5-session arc establishing coherence-based cosmology. Big Bang as maximum coherence (C=1), dark energy as coherence dispersion pressure, galaxy formation from coherence gradients, black holes as coherence concentrations, and cosmic future as equilibrium (C->C0).
strengths: Explains dark energy without new substance
Connects to existing dark matter preprint (v6)
weaknesses: Overlaps with already-published dark matter preprint
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'extension of Synchronism dark matter framework to cosmology'. Reference existing preprint. Focus on novel predictions (w=-1, coincidence resolution, no singularities).

recommendations.summary: Complete 11-session autonomous research track on AI self-awareness. Discovers that Gnosis correctness detector operates at C ~ 0.5 (consciousness threshold). Eight-way convergence with Synchronism sessions. 34 falsifiable predictions. Natural terminus reached.
weaknesses: No experimental validation (blocked - no trained model)
Highly theoretical - may seem speculative to ML audience
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'autonomous research case study' demonstrating AI-driven theory development. Lead with the eight-way convergence finding. Emphasize falsifiable predictions and future validation roadmap.

recommendations.target_venue: Physical Review E or Journal of Physical Chemistry
recommendations.summary: 52-session arc establishing gamma ~ 1 as universal coherence boundary across 61 phenomenon types. Now includes solubility, acid-base equilibrium, redox reactions, equilibrium constants, enzyme kinetics, molecular geometry, solvation, liquid structure, and colligative properties. Central result of Chemistry track.
strengths: 61 phenomenon types at gamma ~ 1 (MAJOR expansion from 52)
Cross-domain universality spanning quantum to biological to classical
Now includes foundational chemistry (equilibrium, solubility, colligative)
weaknesses: Individual session files sparse (only Session 133 available beyond 1-45)
Framework_Summary.md is synthesis, not publishable format
Requires consolidation into single paper or paper series
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'universal coherence boundary in phase transitions'. Compile all 61 phenomenon types into systematic table. Lead with strongest validations (r > 0.95). Target physics journal for credibility. Consider 3-paper series: (1) quantum phenomena, (2) classical/chemical phenomena, (3) biological phenomena.
recommendations.change_notes: Updated 2026-01-25: Sessions expanded from 147-189 to 147-198 (+9 sessions). Phenomenon types increased from 52 to 61. New categories: solubility, acid-base equilibrium, redox, equilibrium constants, enzyme kinetics, molecular geometry, solvation, liquid structure, colligative properties. Readiness increased 0.75->0.80 as coverage now includes foundational chemistry phenomena.

recommendations.target_venue: Philosophy of Physics anthology or Foundations journal
recommendations.summary: 21-session arc establishing complete coherence ontology. 'EVERYTHING IS COHERENCE' (Session #259). Universal equation C(xi) with golden ratio exponent. Connects gravity, quantum, consciousness, time, causality, information, existence, mathematics to single coherence framework.
strengths: Golden ratio appearance in universal equation
weaknesses: Better suited as book than paper
21 sessions = too much for single paper
recommendations.recommended_framing: DEFER for now. This arc is foundational but not suitable for standalone publication yet. Better to publish domain-specific arcs first (QC, Chemistry, Cosmology) then synthesize later. Consider as book project.

recommendations.summary: Complete 5-session arc establishing coherence theory of biological quantum systems. Demonstrates that biology evolved to operate at C* ~ 0.79, not maximum coherence. Covers photosynthesis FMO complex (94% efficiency), enzyme quantum tunneling (5x rate enhancement), and neural coherence in consciousness.
strengths: Strong connection to established quantum biology research
Neural coherence links to Consciousness Arc
Clear 'so what' - explains why evolution optimizes for C* ~ 0.79
weaknesses: Relies on interpreted experimental data (not original experiments)
recommendations.recommended_framing: Position as 'coherence optimization in biological systems'. Lead with photosynthesis efficiency calculation (94% vs 67% classical). Emphasize connection to established quantum biology literature. Frame neural section as 'extension' rather than core claim.

upcoming_candidates.progress: 5 sessions complete - approaching potential publication readiness
key_insights: Dissonance pathway: SC survives if Delta >> eta*kT, not just Delta >> kT
Cuprate eta quantified, iron pnictides analyzed
upcoming_candidates.note: MAJOR PROGRESS. Now at 5 sessions with experimental validation protocol. May warrant promotion to full recommendation if synthesis document is produced. Watch for arc completion signal.
Single session so far. Measurement as sinusoidal sampling. May merge with QC arc or become separate publication.

session_300.title: Experimental Validation Protocol
session_300.significance: First experimental validation protocol for Synchronism predictions
